snippet: The Federal Aviation Administration and the F.B.I are investigating a dozen flights reported to have been hit by a laser beam while flying over New Jersey on Wednesday night.
abstract: Federal Aviation Admin and FBI are probing targeting of 12 flights with laser lights over New Jersey in course of 90 minutes; all flights landed safely, but one pilot was temporarily blinded.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Aviation Administration and the F.B.I are investigating a dozen flights reported to have been hit by a laser beam while flying over New Jersey on Wednesday night.

headline.main: 12 Aircraft Targeted by Laser Beams Above New Jersey
headline.print_headline: 12 Aircraft Above New Jersey Are Targeted by Laser Beams

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Laser (Light Amplification by Stimulated Emission of Radiation)
